column1: * 1944 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to G.E. Selby (19 September 1944).
* 1956 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Terence Tiller.
* 1962 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Alina Dadlez (19 September 1962).
* 1982 - The article "The Sunday Times Magazine 19 September 1982" is published in The Sunday Times Magazine.
* 2004 - The Lord of the Rings Symphony at Mortensen Hall in wikipedia:Hartford
** Gandalf arrives at Edoras but is not allowed to enter.
